function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Habitat encroachment and fragmentation leading to increased wildlife-urban interfaces","Impact":"Higher risk of disease transmission between wildlife and humans","Mitigation":"Implement wildlife conservation measures to reduce habitat fragmentation and encroachment","Technologies":"Satellite monitoring for habitat assessment, wildlife corridors","People":"Wildlife conservation organizations, government agencies","Owner":"Wildlife conservation organizations, government agencies"},{"Description":"Zoonotic diseases originating from wildlife and domestic animals","Impact":"Increased potential for zoonotic disease transmission to humans","Mitigation":"Improved surveillance and regulation of wildlife trade and animal rearing practices","Technologies":"Genomic surveillance, biosecurity measures","People":"Health organizations, wildlife conservation organizations, government agencies","Owner":"Health organizations, wildlife conservation organizations, government agencies"},{"Description":"Conditions in peri-urban areas and highly urbanized centers favoring emergence of infectious diseases","Impact":"Higher risk of infectious disease outbreaks in these areas","Mitigation":"Enhance public health surveillance and access to healthcare services in these regions","Technologies":"Telemedicine, mobile health clinics","People":"Public health authorities, healthcare organizations","Owner":"Public health authorities, healthcare organizations"}]}
